description: Salman Rushdie was stabbed while onstage in Chautauqua, N.Y., the state police said. The author has faced death threats for his 1988 novel “The Satanic Verses.”
title: Salman Rushdie Is Attacked in Western New York
title_page: Salman Rushdie Is Attacked in Western New York - The New York Times
